html:
8.16.21  11:17 am   how do you make epic videos

      that's easy, just tell the truth

8.16.21  10:48 am   what chord is got some money at 1:21

      C#7add4

8.16.21  10:27 am   opinion on mushrooms?

      be careful what you ask them, because they might know everything

8.16.21  10:19 am   Should i be anxious 

      only about whether you should be anxious

8.16.21  9:46 am   how do you know what will come next in a melody?

      you don't, until it arrives. then you still won't know how you know, but at least you'll know

8.16.21  9:31 am   Is social media healthy?

      it all depends if the people using it are healthy

8.16.21  9:28 am   how long do video's take

      i'm setting up some new rules and regulations

8.16.21  8:36 am   what is your best accomplishment 

      being stupid/smart

8.16.21  8:11 am   how do you keep existential crisis away?

      you could make a website about yourself

8.16.21  5:12 am   What is Steve's real name from ' hi I'm Steve' I need to know

      it's your name

8.16.21  4:50 am   What is the meaning of life for you?

      it's you

8.16.21  3:14 am   How does creativity come to you?

     in a different way each time

     How can I be more creative?

     start thinking about what you wish creativity should mean. if you could decide exactly what creative means, what would be the best thing it could mean. this should point you in the right direction

8.16.21  3:06 am   are you particularly proud of any of the songs you've written so far?

     yes

     if so, which ones?

      all of them

8.16.21  2:36 am   What do I wear the first day of school?

      everything you own

8.16.21  2:34 am   Were you a straight A student in high school?

      no

8.16.21  2:32 am   I got a few questions, what is your opinion on gerbils?

     i'm not sure how to identify if something is a gerbil

      Do you answer all the questions that you get?

     no

     Are you working on a new video ( not trying to be annoying)?

     yes

     Do you have pets?

     no

     I'm trying to learn the keyboard, any tips?

     what ever floats your boat. try some things to see if your boat floats

     And do you know have awesome that you are and how much you inspire me and a lot of others? 

     i'm working on it

8.16.21  12:58 am   how do you get inspiration

      i am drowning in inspiration. the hard part is staying afloat

8.16.21  12:51 am   What is your genre of music?

      urgent

8.16.21  12:25 am   Can you calculate my stink factor?

      no

8.16.21  12:23 am   hi how are you doing? 

      pretty good

8.15.21  11:39 pm   what's your favourite thing about comedy?

      it's legal

8.15.21  11:26 pm   Would you ever consider going to the New Canaan Starbucks again?

      sure, if i'm in the area

8.15.21  11:22 pm   how should i decide on my major

      i wonder if you can do them all

8.15.21  10:32 pm   How many questions have you gotten

      2 or 3

8.15.21  10:04 pm   sometimes I get this sort of restless feeling, like I want to find an adventure. Or find something out of the ordinary. and sometimes I'll leave my house and go drive around for while, stopping in little towns around. I almost feel like I'm looking for something. I don't know. it's kind of a strange feeling to deal with. maybe it's what makes me human. but it doesn't really feel like a lot of other people experience the same thing. maybe I'm wrong. I don't know. I don't know what I'm seeking out. maybe I'm seeking out general adventure and meaning and purpose. or maybe I'm seeking out other people up to the same thing. maybe all of those things and then some. I guess I don't have a problem with it. actually I kind of like it. but that doesn't make it any less bewildering. I wonder if you've ever felt this way?

     yes

     And if you have any thoughts on what it is or where it comes from?

     being conscious. consciousness is based on different patterns of things changing or staying the same. in this particular situation, you are looking for change, or perhaps something new to stay the same once you find it

8.15.21  9:23 pm   The concepts of going home and going away seem to crop up a lot in your songs. Is that random, or is there a reason behind that?

      those seem to be central themes of my home planet....... 'Earth'

8.15.21  9:13 pm   How do you make your vids?

      i'm still looking for a good way

8.15.21  9:13 pm   What is the best 7 digit number

      7777777

8.15.21  8:55 pm   is there going to be a character in the next video?

      maybe

8.15.21  8:25 pm   Why aren't there any capital letters in your answers?

      there are, BUT, why are you paying little to no attention whatsoever

8.15.21  8:14 pm   Whats the difference between a circle with infinite radius and a straight line

      i can't tell

8.15.21  7:42 pm   what inspires you

      the 'rotating' sort of world we seem to be living in

8.15.21  7:41 pm   what is love

      it's the "yes" mode, of life

8.15.21  5:33 pm   What is music?

      the secret of the universe. you would think that's great news, because that means we could figure out the secret of the universe by understanding music. but that only raises more questions

8.15.21  5:23 pm   how do I stop getting in the way of myself?

      there's 2 choices here: go through yourself or go around yourself

8.15.21  5:16 pm   have you ever done calculus before and was it hard 

      i took a look at it the other day, but i didn't do any of it

8.15.21  4:52 pm   why am i so dumb?

      this is to help you get through the day

8.15.21  4:40 pm   how do I stop doing something 

      start not doing it

8.15.21  4:21 pm   What's your biggest regret?

      not having a good answer for this question

8.15.21  4:19 pm   should a pretzel be soft or crunchy?

      in a perfect world it can be both

8.15.21  3:42 pm   opinion on love?

      it's ok

8.15.21  3:23 pm   do you make your music

      yes

8.15.21  3:05 pm   In the song "got some money" you can see a house in the next to a mountain, is it the same house from the video "hi, i'm steve?"

      no

8.15.21  1:53 pm   i understand that you do sometimes make use of capital letters, but why is it that you often neglect to use capital letters at the beginning of sentences?

      in some situations it can appear cold and unfriendly. like a letter from the collections department

8.15.21  1:51 pm   do you consider sus chords played 1-2-5 or 1-4-5 triads?

      sus2 means 1 2 5. sus4 means 1 4 5. 'sus' with no number probably means sus4 but if the director happens to be there then you might as well ask them

8.15.21  1:11 pm   How do u feel about people asking why you don't use capital letters while you used them in the ask-button they just clicked on?

      it makes me feel like i am surrounded by people who are not only intelligent but very alert and focused

8.15.21  12:24 pm   Ok, so I've seen you play keyboard, guitar, bass, and air drums throughout your YouTube videos, and I'm just curious, which of these instruments do you think you have least experience with? Like which one could you use the most improvement on?

     guitar

     Which one do you think you have the most experience with?

     drums

      Like which one are you the best at?

     drums

      Thabk you

8.15.21  11:29 am   Can you remake die please

      there's many other things i have yet to make for the first time, so i should take care of those first, then maybe circle back for the re-makes

8.15.21  11:05 am   You sent one of your first notebook entry at the exact hour of my birth, how do you feel about that ?

      i didn't send it anywhere. i saved it on my hard drive. i probably didn't post it to this website until at least 10 years later, maybe even 15

8.15.21  11:00 am   how to make melodies?

      they will attack you, maybe even in your sleep. and you have to be ready to receive them with open arms
